languages.text: "Берегите себя, Ваша Светлость. Мы будем ждать приказа забрать вас сколько потребуется, даже если все ксенофлотилии мира явятся, чтобы стряхнуть нас с орбиты".
"Be careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We'll wait as long as it takes for your retrieval signal even if every xenofleet in the world appears to swat us from orbit."
languages.original_text: "Берегите себя, Ваша Светлость. Мы будем ждать приказа забрать вас сколько потребуется, даже если все ксенофлотилии мира явятся, чтобы стряхнуть нас с орбиты".

traits.locale_text: "Be careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We'll wait for the signal to come get you as long as it takes, even if every xenofleet in the world appears to swat us from orbit."
"Be careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We'll wait for the signal to come get you as long as it takes, even if every xenofleet in the world appears to swat us from orbit."
"Be careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We'll wait as long as it takes for your retrieval signal even if every xenofleet in the world appears to swat us from orbit."
"Be careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We'll wait as long as it takes for your retrieval signal even if every xenofleet in the world appears to swat us from orbit."
"Be careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We'll wait as long as it takes for your retrieval signal even if every xenofleet in the world appears to swat us from orbit."

languages.text: “务必当心，大人。哪怕整个宇宙的异形舰队都打算把我赶出星轨，我们也会一直等待您的信号。”
languages.original_text: "Be careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We'll wait as long as it takes for your retrieval signal even if every xenofleet in the world appears to swat us from orbit."

traits.locale_text: “务必当心，大人。哪怕整个宇宙的异形舰队都打算把我赶出星轨，我们也会一直等待您的信号。”

languages.text: 「よくお考え下さい、閣下。たとえ世界中の異種族艦隊が軌道上から我々を叩きのめすように見えたとしても、我々はあなたの回収信号が出るまでいくらでも待ちます」
languages.original_text: "Be careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We'll wait as long as it takes for your retrieval signal even if every xenofleet in the world appears to swat us from orbit."

traits.locale_text: 「よくお考え下さい、閣下。たとえ世界中の異種族艦隊が軌道上から我々を叩きのめすように見えたとしても、我々はあなたの回収信号が出るまでいくらでも待ちます」

languages.text: «Tenga cuidado, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Esperaremos todo lo que haga falta a su señal de recuperación aunque todas las flotas xenos del mundo aparezcan para eliminarnos de la órbita».
languages.original_text: "Be careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We'll wait as long as it takes for your retrieval signal even if every xenofleet in the world appears to swat us from orbit."

traits.locale_text: «Tenga cuidado, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Esperaremos todo lo que haga falta a su señal de recuperación aunque todas las flotas xenos del mundo aparezcan para eliminarnos de la órbita».

languages.text: "Seid auf der Hut, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir warten so lange wie nötig auf Euer Extraktionssignal, selbst wenn jede Xenoflotte der Welt auftaucht, um uns aus dem Orbit zu schießen."
languages.original_text: "Be careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We'll wait as long as it takes for your retrieval signal even if every xenofleet in the world appears to swat us from orbit."

traits.locale_text: "Seid auf der Hut, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir warten so lange wie nötig auf Euer Extraktionssignal, selbst wenn jede Xenoflotte der Welt auftaucht, um uns aus dem Orbit zu schießen."

languages.text: « Faites attention à vous, Votre Seigneurie. Nous attendrons votre signal d'extraction aussi longtemps que nécessaire, même si toutes les xénoflottes de la galaxie se pointent pour nous faire la peau. »
languages.original_text: "Be careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We'll wait as long as it takes for your retrieval signal even if every xenofleet in the world appears to swat us from orbit."

traits.locale_text: « Faites attention à vous, Votre Seigneurie. Nous attendrons votre signal d'extraction aussi longtemps que nécessaire, même si toutes les xénoflottes de la galaxie se pointent pour nous faire la peau. »

languages.text: "Dikkatli olun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu dünyanın tüm zeno filoları bizi yörüngeden atmaya çalışsa bile sizi almak için sinyalinizi bekliyor olacağız. Ne kadar sürerse sürsün."
languages.original_text: "Be careful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We'll wait as long as it takes for your retrieval signal even if every xenofleet in the world appears to swat us from orbit."
